thread.title: Roy Keane slams Manchester City following Monaco loss and claims Pep Guardiola needs to sign six new players
thread.title_full: Roy Keane slams Manchester City following Monaco loss and claims Pep Guardiola needs to sign six new players

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Roy Keane slams Manchester City following Monaco loss and claims Pep Guardiola needs to sign six new players
text:
Sport Roy Keane slams Manchester City following Monaco loss and claims Pep Guardiola needs to sign six new players The Ligue 1 side beat their visitors 3-1 on the night to progress into the quarter-finals of the Champions League Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Keane insists Man City need up to SIX new players Share this video   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Roy Keane has slammed Manchester City's performance against Monaco and says Pep Guardiola needs to sign six new players. 
The Irishman was speaking on ITV's Champions League Highlights show following City's damning 3-1 loss in the Champions League on Wednesday night. 
Despite going into the tie with a 5-3 lead, Guardiola's frail defensive conceded three goals meaning Monaco won the tie on away goals, the game finishing 6-6 on aggregate. 
The former Manchester United midfielder said City have too many attack minded players and it's costing them. Tiemoue Bakayoko celebrates with Kylian Mbappe-Lottin after scoring (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) 
Keane said: "With the team tonight, they didn't have enough defensive minded players when you see the goals they have given away. (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) 
"I think where Pep wants to bring Man City, that's competing in the Champions League and Premier League, he simply doesn't have the players to do it. The Man City players are just not good enough to get to that level. 
"You can't compare where City are with Barcelona and Bayern Munich when he got to those clubs and I think this will confirm Pep's thoughts from over the last few months. (Photo: REUTERS) 
"You need a big setback in a big game to confirm it and to say to the owners; we need to get four, five, six top quality players into the club. 
"Otherwise when they are at this stage of the competition again next year, they are going to have exactly the same problems." poll loading How many trophies will Man City win this season? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
